stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion to Mend Weary Travelers' Rhythms!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has concocted a marvelous new elixir, "Mic-628." This potent draught can swiftly realign one's inner rhythm, helping folk recover from long, arduous journeys much faster. Travelers weary from crossing vast lands will soon find their energy restored with ease, cutting their recovery time in half.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Discover Tiny Ocean Sprites Hold Key to Realm's Balance!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Sages and Seers have unveiled a crucial secret of the deep oceans. Tiny, shell-building sprites dwelling in the waters play a grand role in balancing the realm's air. These minuscule engineers pull dark humours from the skies, but their magic has been overlooked in the Grand Divination Scrying of the world's weather.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Tournament's Displays Showcase New Golem-Craft!
stories.fantasy_story: The realm prepares for the Grand Tournament, where the Baronies of Sea-Hawk and New-Englander will clash. While the minstrel Bad Bunny will charm the mid-match spectacle, it is the new golem-craft that will truly capture the crowd's eye. Merchants will use enchanted banners featuring these animated servants to promote their wares, much like spirit-driven coin-charms did seasons past.
